commentBody:
Cleveland is a great town, Republicans have ruined the country, please do not ruin Cleveland.

The Secret Service is prohibiting weapons within the arena, not anyone else. republicans passed the open carry law, and they own it.......when I was a teenager, Cleveland was averaging 300 murders per year, now its down to say 95 or so and to quote a former police chief, "Our emergency medical service is much better today than 30 yrs ago"....

Be nice and you can go back to your trailers......
